name: Project Lantern (Mad Tale Games)
description:
Survive the frigid skies of an unknown planet while battling your inner consciousness.Play as Sahari, a lost girl who on her way home, her air ship was heavily damaged by a storm. Wounded, hungry and vulnerable, she must do everything she can to recover, both physically and mentally.

Her mission stays the same: get to the unknown signal to see if she can send a rescue message...
